attr.title: Slime 3k Demake
attr.desc: A blob of goo, initially used to nourish artificial humans, has become sentient and risen up against its creatorâ€”the Despot, an evil AI and the unfortunate ruler of the world in the year 3000! The future is bleak, and humanity is beyond redemption, but at least you have the power to save yourself. This demake is a mini-version of our game, Slime 3K: Rise Against Despot which will be dropping on October 31, 2024.
